snippet: With the forthcoming Wii U, Nintendo executives hope to alter the familiar phenomenon of people together in a room, silently absorbed in their own screens.
abstract: Seth Schiesel describes the innovative features of Nintendo's new Wii U gaming system, which the company hopes will encourage families and friends to play video games together, rather than simply sharing a room while each person plays alone on a separate device.
lead_paragraph: With the forthcoming Wii U, Nintendo executives hope to alter the familiar phenomenon of people together in a room, silently absorbed in their own screens.

headline.seo: Nintendo’s Coming Game System, Wii U
headline.main: Plays Well With Others: Video Game System Transcends Solitude
